review: Except for an occasional glitch the chromecast system is very satisfactory.

review: Previous post was regarding webcam I purchased for my mother!!! sorry!!! lol!Yes I love my goggle chromecast!  I am now able to watch Netflix on my tv!!!  Thanks again!!!
author: carla thornton

review: I have 2. One in the living room & in the bedroom.  I love it. I use it right from my cell phone. 5 stars!!!
author: Denise Mathis

review: great product, but really need Amazon to provide support for it. Tabcasting is not ideal.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Purchased this item for use with my Ipad and, for the most part, works great.  However, a lot of the free movies I get  do not allow me to "cast" onto the chromecast program on my TV.  Not sure if it's because it's a Google device, but seem to work great with Youtube and some other programs.
author: Sherry

review: Got my order b4 the date it was suppose to cum which is great... But for sum reason its slow on the tv from my phone i think i might return it
author: Nickole

review: Bought this for a yankee swap Christmas gift, and it was a hit.  Niece loves it.  Bought the other niece one too.
